info.title: SubscriptionClient
info.description: Subscription client provides an interface to create and manage Azure subscriptions programmatically.

get.description: Lists all of the available Microsoft.Subscription API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available pending Microsoft.Subscription API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Normal response for a successful query. The response body will contain the data that matches the filters specified in the query parameters.

202.description: Accepted. Subscription creation is in progress.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: enrollmentAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the enrollment account to which the subscription will be billed.

subscriptionLink.description: The link to the new subscription.

SubscriptionCreationParameters.description: Subscription Creation Parameters required to create a new Azure subscription.

displayName.description: The display name of the subscription.

owners.description: The list of principals that should be granted Owner access on the subscription. Principals should be of type User, Service Principal or Security Group.

offerType.description: The offer type of the subscription. For example, MS-AZR-0017P (EnterpriseAgreement) and MS-AZR-0148P (EnterpriseAgreement devTest) are available. Only valid when creating a subscription in a enrollment account scope.

additionalParameters.description: Additional, untyped parameters to support custom subscription creation scenarios.

ErrorResponse.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

AdPrincipal.description: Active Directory Principal for subscription creation delegated permission

SubscriptionOperationListResult.description: A list of pending subscription operations.

SubscriptionOperation.description: status of the subscription POST operation.

statusDetail.description: Status Detail of the pending subscription

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Profile, endpoint, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. Current version is 2015-06-01
